channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Exploring the (underwhelming) System.Diagnostics.Metrics source generators: System.Diagnostics.Metrics APIs - Part 2
item.description: In this post I explore the source generators shipped in Microsoft.Extensions.Telemetry.Abstractions, explore the code, and discuss whether I would use them Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-strongly-typed-metics-with-a-source-generator/

item.title: Creating and consuming metrics with System.Diagnostics.Metrics APIs
item.description: In this post I provide an introduction to the System.Diagnostics.Metrics API, and show how to create a custom metric and read it with dotnet-coutners Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-and-consuming-metrics-with-system-diagnostics-metrics-apis/
